application.summary: Visually compare and merge text files

description.p: Diffuse is a tool for visually merging and comparing text files side by side. Diffuse is can visually compare an 2 or more text files against each other, and also allows users to manually adjust line matching and directly edit files. It also supports viewing revisions and merging files in source control management systems (SCM),with support for popular SCMs such as Bazaar, Git, Mercurial, and SVN.
